term: How do the negotiators fair this second time?
content:
ok so now adams tells the negotiators to go back to france and try one more time
this time, however, the french government is now commanded by napoleon
napoleon does negotiate a deal with the negotiators we sent
with a negotiation/deal signed in 1800 (negotiated and ratified), the franco-american alliance is ended and the french agrees to respect our rights at sea and stop seizing our ships
	the french refused to pay for the damaged ships, however
